reviewText:
This is the game you wanted your entire life. It's probably the best game ever made. Don't believe me? Ok then, take a look at these amazing features this game offers:

*4 different crop types. Ever wanted to have a variety in your farming sim games? This is where it's at. It can't get any better than this.
*Cows. With the new motion-track technology, these cows are probably the most detailed you will ever see. They move, eat and do other stuff just like in real life. It's 100% accurate!
*Next-next-gen graphics. With all these kids playing their Xbox One's and PS4's, talking about the next-gen graphics"
date: they don't know that Giants Software already did it. These stunning graphics have been considered to be even more realistic than real-life itself!\n*Atmosphere. You can spend hours sitting in your tractor
hoursPlayed: watching the beautiful scenery with those realistic animations.\n*Multiplayer. Ever wanted to have a farm with friends or family? Now you can! With all the features listed above
voteText: you can just keep playing this game and never even stop! This is currently the only multiplayer game that has been proven to have absolutely zero connection issues and no lag!\n*Perfectly balanced. While other farming games can be a little unrealistic with money
votesTotal:
so everyone can have fun while playing the most realistic game ever!

Still not convinced? Read again!

10/10 would play forever."

reviewText:
Farming Simulator 2011   Is a pretty good game. It's all about you are a farmer to run a business, buy new tools, tractors and more. You begin with fairly simple things but it is easy to upgrade themselves.

The game itself does not have the best graphics, but you still get a good gaming experience. There is also a multiplayer which is very fun to play on.

This game is very time consuming and it takes time to wait for things to grow, but there is always something to do.

My experience of the game is that it's too bad the graphics for my taste but I recommend it anyway. There are also very many Mods to download.

If you find this game on a sale i highly recommend it.

I would like to give this game 7/10 becouse the game is so good of possibility for mods.

reviewText:
I give a thumbs up to the Farming Simulator" franchise.
The reasons are:

1- Its absolutly relaxing gameplay
date: the closest you can get to nature without leaving the house.\n2- It is by far the most deep game that can still be played "passivly"
recommended:
meaning you can fullfil other life duties such as reading/ studying and still enjoy this game in the background.
3- Has enough activities to engage you when you have more time and choose to play more "activly".
4- Even provides multiplayer to enjoy with friends!
5- Very educational for urban people like me who never even knew a thing or 2 about farming.

I will gladly recommend all the versions even today: 2011

reviewText:
SCROLL DOWN TO THE BOTTOM FOR AN UP TO DATE REVIEW

I would say that I like this game. The economy is relatively robust, there's some fun time-keeping challenges in keeping everything balanced, and there's a good bit of variety in vehicles/ crops/ activities/ etc. The graphics aren't great (crops will pop in when you're about 10 meters away, despite being able to render the buildings and mountains in the far distance), but I'll admit, they do the job. On the whole, it has a lot going for it. Except for the controls. Every time I've opened the game the controls have, to some degree, randomized, including at one point, mapping one of the buttons for activating a key tool to the button for turning left. This was the most annoying example, and the first I came across, but there have been plenty of other occurences of two completely separate functions (e.g. changing what crop you sow, and activating the machine that sows fields) to the same button, or with functions completely missing. If this was the first week of the game's release, I'd let it pass, but not in a game that came out in 2010.

TL;DR

Good game ruined by badly coded controls

================================================

REVISED

Checking the local game files fixed the coding issues, but then when I had to update my OS the game just stopped being openable- the icon would pop up, and then crash

reviewText:
Just when you thought a farming simulator would be stupid and boring, you fire up this gem and remember how much fun you had playing with tonka trucks when you were small >_<. This game is more fun than it should be, and allows for some hilarious situations if you decide to drive like a fool, or attempt to use farm equipment in ways not intended.

It does allow for more serious play as a simulation if that is your thing, with many different ways to farm, and a lot of freedom in where you do it.

The one thing I did not like about this game is how the methods of farming are quite alien to the ones I have seen living in farm country (in America, the simulator is euro themed which is fun, but did not make it feel very real for me). Instead of making circles around the fields it seems designed to go across, turn around, go back, ect. Nothing wrong with that, but it is less efficient and realistic (at least for the area I live in, I am not sure if this is how it is done elsewhere). This might be just a symptom of your AI farmhands being hilariously dumb. Nothing stopping you from doing zigzags while driving yourself if you wanted to, but in order to make full use of the hired help, you must very carefully align your derpy farmhands who will just drive back and forth until they reach the edge of the prepared land (mostly...sometimes they might just sit there all lazy like soaking up pay :P)

There are many mods for other maps, AI changes and implements, but I have not used them much myself. I tried a couple for AI improvements and maps but the ones I used made little difference for me, and I preferred the stock map.

reviewText:
The quality of human life depends on our living lives of purpose and meaning.  Purpose and meaning must come from somewhere beyond – from our connectedness with “some higher order of things.”  This “higher order” or “higher power” is the ultimate source of ethics and morality. A sustainable agriculture is built on an ethical foundation of friendship and stewardship – a more enlightened concept of self-interest.

Thus, the new American farmers, who are finding ways to farm more sustainably, are creating a metaphor of a more sustainable human society.  As a society, we must stop exploiting our natural environment.  We must look again to the timeless principle of diversity in finding new means of sustaining human progress.

I believe that we can, and must, help create a new kind of agriculture that will sustain a high “quality of life” for farmers and society, both for this generation and for all generations to come.  That’s why farming is important to America.

reviewText: Probably one of the strongest games of the year, Farming Simulator 2011 takes everything we know about gaming, and throws it all away. Take all the strong points of Left 4 dead, Call of duty, Age of Empires, Starcraft, Need for speed, Gran Turismo, Bejeweled, Plants vs Zombies, Fable 2, Legend of Zelda, Sim City 2000, its all here. If you are into any of the games above, this game is FOR YOU. I cant sum up how awesome this game is in the space given, but i will try my best. Imagine youre a young up and coming entrepeuner, or maybe just some dumb white trash ♥♥♥♥ who inheireted his grandparents farm, because for some reason you still live with them. Imagine one day youre sticking crabs in your butt and they walk in on you and die. Boom. The farm and all the land is yours, its your choice to make it or break it. Design and build your farm, or destroy and conquer others, its all up to you. Your choice, your destiny, Farm Simulator 2011.

reviewText: THE BEST GAME that I like

reviewText: Graphically wise I don't think Farming Simulator 2011 is one of the best games of its type, whilst the exterior of the vehicles look amazing, in the cab they are poorly detailed. On the plus side the lighting effects really do look great and the shadows move with the sun. The headlights and even the flashing becon on the vehicles are well designed and look quite realistic.\n\nThe Career mode is a good way to start learning the game but after time the work gets boring and repeative on your own. The multiplayer, however, is amazing and makes this game only really worthwhile playing if you have friends to play it with as it makes it easier to earn money as well of the fun of working on a task together.

reviewText: Der Landwirtschaftssimulator 2011 ist eine Überraschung für mich gewesen. Ich habe ihn gekauft ohne Interesse and der Landwirtschaft, doch mit der Zeit wuchs mein Interesse an der Technik usw. an. Der Simulator ist realistisch, bietet gute Grafik und ne Menge Spielspaß! Zudem bietet die Community viele hochwertige Modifikationen zum kostenlosen Download!

reviewText:
its a good game. here are my pros and cons:

PROS:
-lot more cooler mods like bale wrappers and tractors that people never converted to newer farming sims
- has some vehicles not found in fs13, but some are on both fs11 and fs13

CONS:
- Lot more challenging to play because theres no page in the pause menu that shows crop growth stages
-no reset button when your vehicles/ implements get stuck
- no hirable workers for the Krone chaff harvester, gotta do it yourself


I dont recomend this game for beginners to the Farming Simulator series but its fun if u are expierienced and want a more challenging farming sim. Also check out the mods for this game theyre pretty good
